lead_paragraph: The Cardinals can clinch their first title since 1982 with a victory in Game 5 in St. Louis on Friday. David Eckstein provided the power for the Cardinals on Thursday night with four hits, including three doubles.
snippet: The Cardinals can clinch their first title since 1982 with a victory in Game 5 in St. Louis on Friday. David Eckstein provided the power for the Cardinals on Thursday night with four hits, including three doubles.
